overview: The tawdry story continues... as women seduce other women, makes love to them and leave them for others. It's high drama on the open seas as these seductive creatures take to the waves in search of women to love and hearts to break. Summer, Deauxma, Bibette and Lone Star star in this dramatic story of lesbian love and betrayal. With almost three hours of hot lesbian lovin' you don't want to miss this new movie from Girlfriends Films.
title: Lesbian Triangles 9
